biotools.summary: ARPIR (Automatic RNA-Seq Pipelines with Interactive Report) performs RNA-Seq analysis: quality control, pre-processing, alignment (primary-analysis), transcript quantification and differential expression analysis on BAM files (secondaty-analysis).
